name: Shikanji
description: a simple, spiced Indian lemonade from North India. It is known as shikajvi too.
ingredients: 3 ½ inch Ginger grated and squeezed into juice
directions: Peel the ginger and grate it.
Squeeze the grated ginger using thumb and fingers to collect the juice and keep it aside.
Squeeze the fresh lemon in a bowl and add rest of the ingredients except ice cubes.
Pour into the glass, add ice cubes and serve.
